sentence.Network_en: Butter, margarine, and oily fish are all good sources of vitamin D.
sentence.Network_cn: 黄油、人造黄油和多脂鱼都含有丰富的维生素D。

sentence.Network_en: In figure 24 "D" denotes quantity demanded and "S" denotes quantity supplied.
sentence.Network_cn: 在图24中，D代表需求量而S代表供应量。

sentence.Network_en: Milk, oily fish and egg all contain vitamin D.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛奶、油性鱼类和鸡蛋都含有维生素D.
